quick_start.title: Hello, World
quick_start.code: IDENTIFICATION DIVISION. PROGRAM-ID. HELLO. PROCEDURE DIVISION. DISPLAY 'Hello, world!'. STOP RUN.

tasks.title: Write text file
tasks.code: IDENTIFICATION DIVISION. PROGRAM-ID. W. ENVIRONMENT DIVISION. INPUT-OUTPUT SECTION. FILE-CONTROL. SELECT F ASSIGN TO 'out.txt' ORGANIZATION IS LINE SEQUENTIAL. DATA DIVISION. FILE SECTION. FD F. 01 REC PIC X(80). WORKING-STORAGE SECTION. PROCEDURE DIVISION. OPEN OUTPUT F. MOVE 'Hello' TO REC. WRITE REC. CLOSE F. STOP RUN.
